name: Escape from Dump Moon Detritus-7
description:
This may take a bit to load.

Controls

To move, use the arrow keys, numpad, QWEADZXC or HJKLYUBN.

To attack enemies, click on the enemy then click on the right pane. You can attack at any distance.

Hints

The clues on an enemy board indicate where their health and armor are. Reveal all their health to defeat them.

On your board, hearts keep you alive. Eyes let you see clues. Some clues require special eyes.

Credits

Programming: Alex Byaly, Zack Sarver

Art: Alex Byaly, Charles McPillan, tileset by V3X3D

Sound: Charles McPillan

Finding all the bugs: Steven Clontz
